basics.name: Danijel Stanić
basics.label: Full Stack Web & Mobile Developer
basics.summary: I'm a full stack developer with few mobile apps under my belt. My professional career until now was mostly centered around implementation of GIS technologies in web and mobile applications. I also have significant experience writing technical documentation from my past experience as environmental consultant. Currently, focusing on deepening my knowledge of backend and devops practices.
